about_the_game:
Quatros Noir unlocks a new dimension you’ve never seen before in the classic formula. Players must navigate four interconnected grids, each with its own set of blocks and rules, giving you that new addictive and unique feeling, in order to achieve that high score!

Experience Quatros Noir in a noir-inspired theme, special effects and smooth jazz soundtracks. With a variety of 20+ game modes, including a gripping campaign mode, competitive PvP modes, and a local co-op mode.



The Rotating Grid is an all-new mechanic that requires you to navigate four interconnected grids, each with its own set of blocks and rules. Careful consideration of block placement is key, as the grids are interconnected and can influence one another.



An exhilarating single-player experience brimming with variety, divided into three sections: Zen, Modes, and Hardcore Levels. Each section has its own unique ambiance and soundtrack, which evolve and change as you delve deeper.

Unravel the mysteries of Quatros Noir in a gripping campaign mode.

A wide variety of competitive PvP modes and a local co-op mode that will test your teamwork. In PvP, you can battle against up to four players in fast-paced matches. In co-op, you and your friends will need to work together on one grid to achieve the highest score.



Experience an atmospheric noir-inspired world with unique visuals and a classic noir style with a modern twist. Combined with some smooth jazz to place you in the zone of Quatros Noir.

short_description: Quatros Noir is a fast-paced, fallen blocks, action puzzle game. Stack your blocks in more than one dimension and clear lines along the way. Master the campaign, +20 single modes, local multiplayer and co-op mode.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
